T02D1904:8b-3: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga //
T02D1904:8b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1904:8b-5: nyes pa'i dra ba mtha' dag rnam par bsal zhing dri med ye shes snang bas mdzes //
T02D1904:8b-6: sangs rgyas sku yi tshogs ni rtag tu sprul pas 'gro ba'i don ni phun tshogs mdzad //
T02D1904:8b-7: kun dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsal rig ma dam pa dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1904:8b-8: rdo rje 'dzin de btud nas 'dus pa'i gzhung du rab gnas cho ga bdag gis rab tu bshad //
T02D1904:8b-9: rab gnas mkha' dbyings mnyam nyid rjes 'brel ba //
T02D1904:8b-10: bde gshegs glegs bam rdo dril chos de bzhin //
T02D1904:8b-11: 'jig rten don dam ma rtogs de yi phyir //
T02D1904:8b-12: 'jig rten phan phyir mgon pos rab gnas mdzad //
T02D1904:8b-14: stang stabs stan dang sbyin sreg bzlas //
T02D1904:8b-15: mchod pa'i las kyi sbyor ba dang //
T02D1904:8b-16: bsdu ba zhes bya de nyid bcu //
T02D1904:8b-17: slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing //
T02D1904:8b-18: sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02D1904:9a-0: @9a * // mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1904:9a-1: bstan bcos kun gyi don la mkhas //
T02D1904:9a-2: bla ma las ni dbang kun thob //
T02D1904:9a-3: rjes su gnang ba'i yon tan can //
T02D1904:9a-4: brtan po dam tshig sdom par ldan //
T02D1904:9a-5: theg pa gsum gyi dgongs pa shes //
T02D1904:9a-6: sku gzugs mchod rten gtsug lag khang ;
T02D1904:9a-7: / dam chos ras ris glegs bam rnams //
T02D1904:9a-8: bzang po tshad kyis mdzes pa dang /
T02D1904:9a-9: rdzogs pa bde ba'i rgyu rnams la //
T02D1904:9a-10: de shes mtshan nyid rtogs pa yis //
T02D1904:9a-11: rab gnas bya bar 'os pa ste //
T02D1904:9a-12: rjes su yi rang byed pa dang //
T02D1904:9a-13: yon bdag bsod nams spel phyir ro //
T02D1904:9a-14: nam yang rab gnas dman pa ni //
T02D1904:9a-15: cho ga nyams pas mi bya ste //
T02D1904:9a-18: de phyir dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
T02D1904:9a-19: thams cad la yang nan tan bya //
T02D1904:9a-20: rtog pa las byung de bzhin du //
T02D1904:9a-21: rang nyid kyi ni nus pas bsgrub//
T02D1904:9a-22: de ltar byas na bsod nams che //
T02D1904:9a-23: mthong dang ma mthong skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1904:9a-24: gsang sngags bzang pos lha rnams ni //
T02D1904:9a-25: bzhugs par 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
T02D1904:9a-26: gang du sku gzugs zin pa ni //
T02D1904:9a-27: yun ring mchod pa ma byas bzhugs //
T02D1904:9a-28: yon bdag la ni mi shis 'byung //
T02D1904:9a-29: ji srid rab gnas ma byas par //
T02D1904:9a-30: dper na skyes bu la la zhig / rigs dang mtshan nyid bral ba la //
T02D1904:9a-31: 'jig rten kun gyis mchod bya min //
T02D1904:9a-32: de bzhin du yang gzugs brnyan no //
T02D1904:9a-33: gang zhig rab gnas ma byas la //
T02D1904:9a-34: phyag dang mchod pa gang zhig dang //
T02D1904:9a-35: gsang sngags dman pas bsreg rdzas bzhin //
T02D1904:9a-36: 'bras med sbyin sreg thal bar zad //
T02D1904:9a-37: de bzhin gsang sngags med par ni //
T02D1904:9a-38: chos gnas mchod pa byed pa yang //
T02D1904:9a-39: las de yi ni rnam smin gyis //
T02D1904:9a-40: skye ba kun du mi mchod 'gyur //
T02D1904:9a-41: de la thog ma nyid du rang nyid bsod nams 'dod pas sam //
T02D1904:9a-42: slob mas gsol ba btab pas rab gnas rtsol ba na /
T02D1904:9a-43: re zhig sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste /
T02D1904:9a-44: de la ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas 'khor
T02D1904:9a-45: los sgyur ba'i sngags dang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i
T02D1904:9b-0: gzhan dag gi sngags khri bzla @9b bar bya'o //
T02D1904:9b-1: yang na bdag po'i bkas sam lhag par mos pas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D1904:9b-2: gang gi tshe slob mas mandala sngon du song bas
T02D1904:9b-3: lan gnyis sam gsum mchog tu gsol ba btab pa
T02D1904:9b-4: de'i tshe // slob dpon gyis yo byad 'tshogs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D1904:9b-5: de na re cung zad ni 'tshogs la cung zad ni ma 'tshogs so zhes zer na /
T02D1904:9b-6: de'i tshe yang slob ma'i lte bar nyi ma la
T02D1904:9b-7: gnas pa'i h'um yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis snying
T02D1904:9b-8: gar gnas pa kam yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1904:9b-9: byung ba nag po'i rnam par gyur ba'i rlig pa
T02D1904:9b-10: 'phyang ba sha za lta bu'i sdig pa sna'i rtse
T02D1904:9b-12: yi ge h'um de yang snying gar 'thon pas g-yon
T02D1904:9b-13: brkyang ba mche ba gtsigs pa gsum pa 'phyang ba
T02D1904:9b-14: sku mdog nag po phyag g-yon snying gar sdigs mdzub
T02D1904:9b-16: phyag g-yas mche ba gdengs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin khro ba'i gzugs can du byas nas 'thon pas /
T02D1904:9b-17: aom badzra yaksha kro dha kh'a da kh'a da p'a
T02D1904:9b-18: pa n+ya s+ya h'um phat ces bya bas sdig pa
T02D1904:9b-19: 'di zar bcug nas slob ma de yang sam yig
T02D1904:9b-20: las kun du bzang po'i gzugs su rnam par bsams
T02D1904:9b-21: te / de'i sems kyi bgegs rnams bdud rtsi 'khyil
T02D1904:9b-22: pas phur bus btab ste phur bu'i 'od zer shin
T02D1904:9b-23: tu drag pa 'jigs pa rnams kyis gdug pa thams
T02D1904:9b-25: slob ma'i snying gar bsrung ba'i don du yi ge
T02D1904:9b-26: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dbyangs tha ma
T02D1904:9b-27: pa las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rjes byin gyis
T02D1904:9b-29: de nas sngags pas stegs bu rnying pa'am /
T02D1904:9b-30: mchod rten gyi gzhi 'am lha'i rigs kyi khang pa
T02D1904:9b-31: la sogs pa yongs su brtags pa'i sa gzhi yod
T02D1904:9b-32: par phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyis sbyang
T02D1904:9b-35: rdo rje gur dang ra ba dang /
T02D1904:9b-38: lhag par gnas ba dang thig gdab pa dang rdul
T02D1904:9b-39: tshon dgye ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi cho
T02D1904:9b-40: ga'i rim pa las bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1904:9b-41: de nas sngags pas yongs su brtags shing shin tu
T02D1904:9b-42: 'jam pa'i sa phyogs su stan bde ba la 'dug
T02D1904:10a-0: ste / mdun du bsang gtor la sogs pa'i snod bzhag nas @10a * //
T02D1904:10a-1: dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas te /
T02D1904:10a-2: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bum pa rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1904:10a-3: de la rtsa ba dang nag po med pa mchu
T02D1904:10a-4: 'phyang ba mgrin pa ring ba lto ba che ba
T02D1904:10a-5: nas dang gro dang ma sha dang 'bras so ba
T02D1904:10a-6: dang til rnams te 'bru lnga dang /
T02D1904:10a-7: bri ha sti dang kanda ka ri dang aa pa
T02D1904:10a-8: ra dzi ta dkar po dang ha sa dang ha
T02D1904:10a-9: sa de ba rnams te sman lnga dang /
T02D1904:10a-10: gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang byi ru dang mu men rnams te rin po che lnga dang /
T02D1904:10a-11: gur gum dang gla rtsi dang si hla dang tsandan
T02D1904:10a-12: dang ga bur rnams te dri lnga dang ldan pa
T02D1904:10a-13: / bsti gnas kyi chus gang ba /
T02D1904:10a-14: 'dzam bu dang ka pidtha dang ma du lung ga
T02D1904:10a-15: dang shr'i pha la ste yal ga lngas kha brgyan
T02D1904:10a-16: pa / gos sar pa zung gis mgul pa dkris pa /
T02D1904:10a-17: chos 'byung la gnas pa'i rang gi lha'i mtshan mas
T02D1904:10a-18: mtshan pa la yi ge bam las rin po che'i
T02D1904:10a-19: rang bzhin las byas par bsams nas gdugs dang bcas
T02D1904:10a-20: pa rjes su mthun pa'i gdan la bzhag pa'i rnam
T02D1904:10a-21: par rgyal ba'i bum par 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil
T02D1904:10a-22: 'khor gyi gtso bo bsgoms nas me tog gi phreng
T02D1904:10a-23: bas dkris pa'i rdo rje bum pa'i steng du bzhag
T02D1904:10a-24: ste / rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dang 'brel ba'i phreng ba'i rtse mo nas bzung ste /
T02D1904:10a-25: yi ge gsum dang spel ba'i rang gi lha'i sngags
T02D1904:10a-26: kyis aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba des brgya rtsa
T02D1904:10a-27: brgyad du de la mngon par bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1904:10a-28: de nas aargha la sogs pa phul te mchod pa lngas mchod nas /
T02D1904:10a-29: dril bu dkrol bzhin pas mngon par bstod par bya'o //
T02D1904:10a-30: de nas gzhan yang dkyil 'khor pa'i bum pa rnams
T02D1904:10a-31: ni cung zad chung ba rjes su mthun pa'i gdan
T02D1904:10a-32: la bzhag pa rnams la dri'i chu yis bkang ste
T02D1904:10a-33: / 'dzam bu dang tsu ta la sogs pa'i yal
T02D1904:10a-34: gas kha brgyan pa sman lnga la sogs pa dang
T02D1904:10a-35: ldan pa mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa rang gi
T02D1904:10a-36: lha'i mtshan ma gdugs dang bcas pa /
T02D1904:10a-37: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha bsgoms pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1904:10a-38: dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags yi ge gsum dang spel bas tha mar aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1904:10a-39: len bdun bdun bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1904:10b-0: 'gro ba kun bsang ba'i don du bum pa @10b gzhan du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1904:10b-1: aom aa bighn'am ta kri ta h'um aa dhi tishtha
T02D1904:10b-2: zhes bya ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzla bar
T02D1904:10b-3: bya'o // de bzhin du aargha la sogs pa phul nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1904:10b-5: bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du phyogs
T02D1904:10b-6: skyong rnams la de'i sngags kyis gtor ma sbyin par
T02D1904:10b-7: bya'o // de la 'di ltar bum pa lhag par
T02D1904:10b-8: gnas pa nyi ma re re zhing thun gsum gsum
T02D1904:10b-9: bya'o // du bya'o // bum pa mdor bsdu ba'i phyogs la ni rigs kyi yum bzhi dang /
T02D1904:10b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang rang gi rigs dang bcas pa lnga dang /
T02D1904:10b-11: las thams cad ba'i bum pa dang bcur brtag par bya'o //
T02D1904:10b-12: rdul tshon dgye ba bum pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1904:10b-13: de la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni gtso
T02D1904:10b-14: bo'i g-yas phyogs su'am dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du
T02D1904:10b-15: gzhag par bya'o // dkyil 'khor ba'i bum pa rnams
T02D1904:10b-16: ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi zur bzhir dgod
T02D1904:10b-17: gzhag par bya'o // par bya'o // las thams cad
T02D1904:10b-18: ba'i bum pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi khang ba'i rtsa
T02D1904:10b-19: ba'i sgo'i g-yas phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1904:10b-20: de nas bum pa de rnams las chu nyung zad
T02D1904:10b-21: nyung zad blangs te bdud rtsi lnga'i snod du blugs
T02D1904:10b-22: nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du gzhag
T02D1904:10b-23: par bya'o // de ltar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1904:10b-24: phyi rol gyis gzhi nye bar byugs par gyen du
T02D1904:10b-25: bsgreng ba'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang
T02D1904:10b-26: par bya'o // / bla re phub pa'i mtha' ma rnams nas rnga yab dkar po dbyangs te /
T02D1904:10b-27: dri zhim po'i me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram
T02D1904:10b-28: nas dum bu dang bsdus pa la sogs pa'i spos
T02D1904:10b-29: dud gtul te / si hla dang /
T02D1904:10b-33: tsandan dang 'dres pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags bzlas
T02D1904:10b-34: pas chag chag btab pa'i sa'i char pi wang dang
T02D1904:10b-35: / gling bu dang rnga zlum dal ba dang /
T02D1904:10b-36: glu dang gar gyi dga' ston dang /
T02D1904:10b-37: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhis brgyan cing bum
T02D1904:10b-38: pa gang bas brgyan pa'i gnas su gza' dang rgyu
T02D1904:10b-39: skar dang / dus sbyor bzang po 'dzom pa'i nyin
T02D1904:10b-40: zhag bzang po la khrus dang gtsang sgra byas te
T02D1904:10b-41: gos dang rgyan bzang po dbu rgyan me tog dang
T02D1904:10b-42: bcas pas grogs bzang po dang lag pa rdo rje
T02D1904:11a-1: 'dzin pas stan thog mthon po 'jam pa la 'dug ste /
T02D1904:11a-2: mdun du bsang gtor la sogs pa'i snod bzhag nas
T02D1904:11a-3: dkyil 'khor mchod de ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i
T02D1904:11a-4: sngags pas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs las gsungs pa
T02D1904:11a-6: de nas mngon du phyogs pa'i lha rnams kun gyi
T02D1904:11a-7: mchog dang ldan pa zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa
T02D1904:11a-8: / rjes su mthun pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang gdan la snyoms par zhugs pa /
T02D1904:11a-9: rten dang brten par bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor sa bon
T02D1904:11a-10: dang phyag mtshan gyis thugs kar byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1904:11a-11: / rigs dang mthun pa'i cod pan gyi lha rnams skad cig mas bltas la /
T02D1904:11a-12: nam mkha' la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D1904:11a-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdor bsdus pa'i gzugs
T02D1904:11a-14: dkyil 'khor bas yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1904:11a-15: bdag po mngon par bltas la bsang gtor la sogs
T02D1904:11a-16: pa phul te / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1904:11a-17: las spros pa'i gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1904:11a-18: lha mo rnams kyis sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod
T02D1904:11a-19: nas bstod pa byas te bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o
T02D1904:11a-20: pa phul te / // de nas dri zhim po'i me tog gi snyim pas lus btud de /
T02D1904:11a-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pa ra ma su kh'a sha ya su la li ta /
T02D1904:11a-22: bi l'a sen'a mi teern'a m'a mi bha ga w'antam
T02D1904:11a-23: dza:h'um bam ho:pra t'i tstsha ku su ma aanydza li
T02D1904:11a-24: n'a tha ho sa ma ya stvam /
T02D1904:11a-25: zhes brjod pas snyim pa'i me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D1904:11a-26: de nas pus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te /
T02D1904:11a-27: lag pa g-yas pas spos dud bskyod pas bdag po
T02D1904:11a-28: de dag gzhan dag kyang snyan gsan dbab par bya'o
T02D1904:11a-29: // bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mchog / rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1904:11a-30: mgon po bdag ni rab gnas dag / dgyid par 'tshal gyi thugs rje can //
T02D1904:11a-31: slob ma rnams la phan pa dang //
T02D1904:11a-32: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1904:11a-33: bcom ldan gus pa bdag la ni //
T02D1904:11a-34: rjes su gzung bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D1904:11a-35: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad dag / dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs pa las //
T02D1904:11a-36: lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhum [*lhums?] gshegs ltar //
T02D1904:11b-0: de bzhin gnas 'dir bzhugs su @11b gsol //
T02D1904:11b-1: 'dir ni rtag tu bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D1904:11b-2: me tog la sogs mchod pa rnams //
T02D1904:11b-3: byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02D1904:11b-4: che ge'i don du bzhes su gsol //
T02D1904:11b-6: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1904:11b-7: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1904:11b-8: gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02D1904:11b-9: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02D1904:11b-10: 'byung po sangs rgyas bstan gnas dang //
T02D1904:11b-11: bstan la mngon dga'i sems can rnams //
T02D1904:11b-12: gang zhig rdo rje'i mig can yang //
T02D1904:11b-13: rdo rje can bdag che ge mo //
T02D1904:11b-14: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02D1904:11b-15: nye bar spyod pa ci nus kyis //
T02D1904:11b-17: rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te //
T02D1904:11b-18: slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni //
T02D1904:11b-19: 'di dag lhan cig thams cad kyis //
T02D1904:11b-20: nye ba nyid du mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D1904:11b-21: de ltar lan gsum du snyan gsan phab nas snga
T02D1904:11b-22: ma bzhin yang dag par mchod de bstod nas bdud
T02D1904:11b-24: de ltar lha snyan gsan dbab pa byas nas bdag nyid gzengs bstod par bya ste /
T02D1904:11b-25: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D1904:11b-26: bdag gi gson pa 'bras bur bcas //
T02D1904:11b-27: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02D1904:11b-28: gyur par bdag ni the tshom med //
T02D1904:11b-29: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02D1904:11b-30: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02D1904:11b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02D1904:11b-32: deng bdag skyes par the tshom med //
T02D1904:11b-33: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02D1904:11b-34: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02D1904:11b-35: sangs rgyas thams cad snyan mnan pas //
T02D1904:11b-36: di ring bdag ni nye bar gyur //
T02D1904:11b-37: de'i rjes la slob dpon gyis sgrub grogs yod na
T02D1904:11b-38: dkyil 'khor gyi sar bzhag la phyi rol du byung
T02D1904:11b-39: ste // bdag po 'am khro bo'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D1904:11b-40: bza' btung dang nya sha dang 'bras mar gyi spod
T02D1904:11b-41: dang til dang snum khur zlum po la sogs pa'i
T02D1904:11b-42: gtor ma man ngag ji lta ba bzhin sbyangs te
T02D1904:11b-43: ste // / gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dbang
T02D1904:11b-44: po la sogs pa bkug nas so so'i phyogs kyi
T02D1904:11b-45: sgo nyid du bsang gtor dang zhabs bsil la sogs
T02D1904:11b-46: pa byin nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1904:12a-0: @12a * // snyim pas lan gsum du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1904:12a-1: de nas zhal bsil la sogs pa phul te yang dag par mchod nas slar gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1904:12a-2: de nas nang du zhugs te bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i
T02D1904:12a-3: bzlas pa'i skud pa sum dkris su mdud pa gsum
T02D1904:12a-4: gyis dpung pa g-yas par bcings te /
T02D1904:12a-5: las thams cad pa'i chus g-yas g-yon du bsangs te slob ma bsrung ba'o //
T02D1904:12a-6: phrin las 'di dag thams cad legs par bskul ba
T02D1904:12a-7: byas pa'i slob ma dang lhan cig spyad par bya'o
T02D1904:12a-8: // de dag la yang 'di bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D1904:12a-9: gsang sngags gang cung zad cig smra //
T02D1904:12a-10: mchod sogs cho ga de bya ste //
T02D1904:12a-12: sgyu yis bya ba ma yin nyid //
T02D1904:12a-13: de nas bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bdud rtsi
T02D1904:12a-14: 'khyil pa'i sngags ji srid 'dod par bzlas te nyal
T02D1904:12a-15: bar bya'o // 'di ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1904:12a-16: de nas phyi de nyin par tho rangs kyi dus
T02D1904:12a-17: su ji skad bstan pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang
T02D1904:12a-18: / yo byad thams cad 'tshogs pa'i sngags pas zhi
T02D1904:12a-19: ba'i gtor ma btang nas lha la mngon du phyogs
T02D1904:12a-20: te lha'i rnal 'byor byas pas sku gzugs zhal shar
T02D1904:12a-21: du gzigs pa na bza' ser pos dkris pa la
T02D1904:12a-22: sngar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can du rnal 'byor gyis
T02D1904:12a-23: bskyed pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
T02D1904:12a-27: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa stegs bu'i steng
T02D1904:12a-28: du 'dug stan gtsang ma la bzhag nas dri ma
T02D1904:12a-29: sel ba rnams kyis dri ma bsal bar bya'o //
T02D1904:12a-30: de la khu tshur g-yas g-yon gyis bzung ba'i yungs
T02D1904:12a-31: kar dang chu dang zan lugs su 'byung ba dang
T02D1904:12a-32: / lugs las bzlog pas bskor zhing aom sarba p'a
T02D1904:12a-33: pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a zhes bya
T02D1904:12a-34: ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum mer blugs par bya'o //
T02D1904:12a-35: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02D1904:12a-36: zhes bya ba lan bdun du bzlas pa'i dri zhim
T02D1904:12a-37: po'i mar khus ku sha'i tshom bu bzang po byugs
T02D1904:12a-38: nas khar ba'i snod du bzhag pa'i ba ta dang
T02D1904:12a-42: blag sha'i shun pa brdungs pas brud nas sa bon
T02D1904:12a-43: lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang 'dres
T02D1904:12b-0: @12b pa'i ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o //
T02D1904:12b-1: phyi nas rgyal po dbang bskur ba'i gdugs dkar po
T02D1904:12b-2: 'dzin pa'i mi dang bcas pas rgyal ba dang bkra
T02D1904:12b-3: shis kyi tshigs su bcad ba rnams kyis bstod bzhin
T02D1904:12b-4: pa dang / turya'i sgra dang bud med rnams kyi ca co'i sgra rnams dang /
T02D1904:12b-5: nye bar mtshon pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho gas spyan
T02D1904:12b-6: la sogs pa'i phyag gis bzung ba'i bum pa ye
T02D1904:12b-7: shes kyi chus gang ba rnams kyis dbang bskur bar
T02D1904:12b-8: lhag par mos pas khrus kyi tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1904:12b-9: brjod bzhin pas bum pa'i chus khrus gsol bar bya'o
T02D1904:12b-10: // de la khrus kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni //
T02D1904:12b-11: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1904:12b-12: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol pa //
T02D1904:12b-13: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1904:12b-14: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02D1904:12b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ye shr'i h'um /
T02D1904:12b-16: po ti dang thang sku la sogs pa rnams la
T02D1904:12b-17: ni lhag par mes pas me long la khrus gsol
T02D1904:12b-18: bar bya'o // de la dbang bskur ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1904:12b-19: dang po ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pas so //
T02D1904:12b-20: de nas rnam snang la sogs pa'i bum pas so //
T02D1904:12b-21: de nas ni spyan la sogs pa'i bum pas so //
T02D1904:12b-22: de nas ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i bum pas so //
T02D1904:12b-23: de nas ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i bum pas so //
T02D1904:12b-24: de nas ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i bum pas so //
T02D1904:12b-25: de'i tshe yang bkra shis kyi glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D1904:12b-26: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni //
T02D1904:12b-27: bkra shis gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku //
T02D1904:12b-28: gcig nyid dang ni du ma nyid kyang rnam spangs pa'i //
T02D1904:12b-29: ma gos gzugs med rdul dang bral ba gang yin pa'i //
T02D1904:12b-30: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs
T02D1904:12b-31: shog / bkra shis gang zhig sangs rgyas sras kyis
T02D1904:12b-32: yongs bskor zhing // longs spyod rdzogs sku dam chos kyi ni gsungs dang bcas //
T02D1904:12b-33: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su brgyan gyur pa //
T02D1904:12b-34: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs
T02D1904:12b-35: shog / bkra shis gang zhig nags kyi me ni
T02D1904:12b-36: mched pa ltar // 'jug dang 'bar dang yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yis //
T02D1904:12b-37: sprul pa'i sku mchog gzhan gyi don ni mdzad pa'o //
T02D1904:13a-0: bkra shis de yis khyed la rtag tu bde legs shog / bkra shis @13a * //
T02D1904:13a-1: gang zhig sems can kun la phan byed pa'i //
T02D1904:13a-2: sangs rgyas rnam dag blo ldan nyes pa'i tshogs dang bral //
T02D1904:13a-3: shes rab yan lag 'dus pas mdzes pa'i bde ba'i
T02D1904:13a-4: bdag / bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni
T02D1904:13a-5: dbang mchog bskur // bkra shis gang zhig lha dang lha min mis mchod pa //
T02D1904:13a-6: de yis bstan pa'i dam chos bla na med pa ni //
T02D1904:13a-7: bdag med 'jig rten gsum las rab tu grags pa yi //
T02D1904:13a-8: bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la yang dbang mchog bskur //
T02D1904:13a-9: bkra shis gang zhig rab mchog dam chos rtag tu 'dzin //
T02D1904:13a-10: bzang po'i sar bzhugs sangs rgyas sras po'i tshogs kyi
T02D1904:13a-11: mchog / rnam pa kun du sems can don mdzad
T02D1904:13a-12: bkra shis bzang // bkra shis de yis khyed rnams la ni dbang mchog bskur //
T02D1904:13a-13: de ltar rim pa bzhin du khrus gsol nas /
T02D1904:13a-14: de nas gos dkar po srab mos phyis te gur
T02D1904:13a-15: kum gyi lde gus byugs pa la na bza' dkar
T02D1904:13a-16: po zung gcig / aom di bya p'a sa se
T02D1904:13a-17: sv'a h'a / zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yongs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1904:13a-18: aom a'a:badzra gandhe h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ga
T02D1904:13a-19: bur dang gla rtsi dang gur gum la sogs pa'i
T02D1904:13a-20: dri rnams kyis mnyam par byugs nas gal te yod
T02D1904:13a-21: na / aom badzra a'a ba ra na bi bhu sha ne sva h'a /
T02D1904:13a-22: zhes bya bas spyan dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1904:13a-23: de nas go ro tsa na'i thig le byas te me tog dang bdug spos dang /
T02D1904:13a-24: mar me tambo la yang phul nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis kun du bsrungs te /
T02D1904:13a-25: dkyil 'khor la yang h'um yig gis bteg nas takki'i
T02D1904:13a-26: sngags la aa kham b'i ra h'um zhes bya ba'i
T02D1904:13a-27: sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbus su gzhag
T02D1904:13a-28: par bya'o // de nas yod na phyi rol gyi
T02D1904:13a-29: rig ma de med na bsgom pa dang lhan cig
T02D1904:13a-31: padma dang rdo rje'i sgras bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1904:13a-32: pa rnams rang gi snying gar bcug nas zhu bar
T02D1904:13a-33: byas te rang gi rdo rje go cha'i lam nas
T02D1904:13a-34: shes rab kyi padma'i nang du lhung bar gyur pa
T02D1904:13a-35: dang / shes rab kyi ba spu'i bu ga rnams nas 'od zer du gyur nas 'thon pa dang /
T02D1904:13a-36: nam mkha' khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par blos nye bar bzhag ste /
T02D1904:13b-0: bsang gtor @13b dang zhal bsil la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1904:13b-1: de nas rang gi snying ga nas spros pa'i 'phags
T02D1904:13b-2: pa gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo'i rgyal
T02D1904:13b-3: po rnams kyis de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i bgegs
T02D1904:13b-4: kyi rigs bkug bskrad nas de rnams nyid dza:h'um bam
T02D1904:13b-5: ho:zhes bya bas dgug pa dang ;
T02D1904:13b-6: shin tu nges par rdzogs pa de la rab tu
T02D1904:13b-7: gzhug cing bcings te dbang du byas te spyan dang
T02D1904:13b-8: sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1904:13b-9: dbang bskur ba yang byas nas bsang gtor la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1904:13b-10: de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1904:13b-11: chu dang de bzhin thang las skyes //
T02D1904:13b-12: me tog dam pa 'di dag ni //
T02D1904:13b-13: bdag gis gus pas phul bas na //
T02D1904:13b-14: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1904:13b-16: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis me tog dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1904:13b-17: lhan skyes de bzhin sbyar ba yi //
T02D1904:13b-18: bdug spos dam pa 'di dag ni //
T02D1904:13b-19: mchog tu gus pas rab tu 'bul //
T02D1904:13b-20: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1904:13b-21: aom a'a:badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spos so //
T02D1904:13b-22: lhan skyes de bzhin sbyar ba yi //
T02D1904:13b-23: dri mchog dam pa 'di dag nyid //
T02D1904:13b-24: mchog tu gus pas bdag 'bul gyis //
T02D1904:13b-25: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol//
T02D1904:13b-26: aom a'a:badzra gandhe h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dri'o //
T02D1904:13b-28: snum ldan sgron ma 'di dag ni //
T02D1904:13b-29: rab tu dang bas 'bul lags na //
T02D1904:13b-30: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D1904:13b-31: aom a'a:badzra d'i pe h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sgron ma'o //
T02D1904:13b-32: zhal zas rnam kun yang dag ldan //
T02D1904:13b-33: bza' dang ston mor bcas pa 'di //
T02D1904:13b-34: kha dog ro dang drir ldan pa //
T02D1904:13b-35: dbul lo yang dag bzhes su gsol //
T02D1904:13b-36: aom a'a:badzra nee bi tya h'um zhes bya bas lha bshos so //
T02D1904:13b-37: de nas zhal bsil phul te /
T02D1904:13b-39: mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1904:13b-40: tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bstod nas bdud rtsi
T02D1904:13b-41: myang bar bya'o // de nas thal mo sbyar te
T02D1904:13b-42: lus btud nas sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pas de
T02D1904:13b-43: kho na nyid kyi bden pa bdar bar bya'o //
T02D1904:13b-44: nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D1904:13b-45: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /
T02D1904:14a-0: @14a * // sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D1904:14a-1: rdo rje che ger bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1904:14a-2: dkon mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D1904:14a-3: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1904:14a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D1904:14a-5: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1904:14a-6: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
T02D1904:14a-7: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02D1904:14a-8: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D1904:14a-9: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02D1904:14a-10: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol pa de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1904:14a-11: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1904:14a-12: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02D1904:14a-13: dkon mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D1904:14a-14: dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis //
T02D1904:14a-15: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas //
T02D1904:14a-16: rdo rje snying po bdag por bdag / sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02D1904:14a-17: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
T02D1904:14a-18: sems can kun gyi yid la gnas //
T02D1904:14a-19: sems can kun gyi yab nyid kyang //
T02D1904:14a-20: dam tshig rtse mo 'dod pa'i mchog / bden pa
T02D1904:14a-21: gang gis ye shes mchog / shes rab thabs bdag
T02D1904:14a-22: dkyil 'khor na // bden pa de yis mgon bdag po //
T02D1904:14a-23: 'dod pa yongs su grub par shog / ces bya ba'o //
T02D1904:14a-24: de nas yi ge brgya pa lan bdun du bzlas pa bya ste //
T02D1904:14a-25: aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya ;
T02D1904:14a-26: badzra stva tve no pa tishthi dri dho mebha ba /
T02D1904:14a-27: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1904:14a-28: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1904:14a-29: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1904:14a-30: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:ku ru h'um /
T02D1904:14a-31: ha ha ha ha ho bha ga b'an sarba ta
T02D1904:14a-32: th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzra bha ba
T02D1904:14a-33: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa:zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1904:14a-34: de ltar brtan par byas nas sems can don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1904:14a-35: mgon po skal ba de bzhin du //
T02D1904:14a-36: des ni 'gro don kun du mdzod //
T02D1904:14a-37: sna tshogs gzugs ni bzung nas kyang //
T02D1904:14a-38: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su //
T02D1904:14a-40: de nas phyi rol du byung ste gtor ma btang
T02D1904:14a-41: nas padma'i snod kyi bdud rtsis tshim par byas nas
T02D1904:14a-43: phyogs skyong gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1904:14a-44: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang
T02D1904:14a-45: ldan pa'i slob dpon nang du zhugs nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1904:14a-46: gyi lha la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyag
T02D1904:14b-0: 'tshal te / cho ga ma tshang ba bskang @14b ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1904:14b-1: de la dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su 'dug ste
T02D1904:14b-2: byang du mngon par phyogs pa'i sngags pa ting nge
T02D1904:14b-3: 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas sbyin sreg gi rab tu
T02D1904:14b-4: byed pa nas bshad pa'i cho ga las thams cad
T02D1904:14b-5: pa'i thab khung du rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1904:14b-6: sbyin sreg gi tha mar slob ma'i zhi rgyal 'phel
T02D1904:14b-7: bar bya ba'i don du mthe bong lag pa g-yas
T02D1904:14b-9: bsreg rdzas re re zhing lan gsum mam bdun bdun bsreg gam bsreg tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1904:14b-10: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma las yon blang bar bya ste /
T02D1904:14b-11: slob mas kyang dga' ba'i yid kyis rang gi 'byor
T02D1904:14b-12: pa dang mthun pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
T02D1904:14b-13: bu mo dang / rta dang glang po dang shing
T02D1904:14b-14: rta dang ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa
T02D1904:14b-15: rnams dang gser dang dngul dang zangs dang nor bu
T02D1904:14b-16: dang mu tig la sogs pa'i nor rdzas dang /
T02D1904:14b-17: lo tog yongs su rgyas pa'i zhing sa dang /
T02D1904:14b-18: khyim dang kun dga' ra ba dang /
T02D1904:14b-19: ldum ra la sogs pa'i gnas dang /
T02D1904:14b-21: bran mo la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams mngon par 'dod pa'i dgos pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1904:14b-22: slob dpon mnyes pas lha rnams mnyes //
T02D1904:14b-23: mnyes pas dngos grub rab stsol 'gyur //
T02D1904:14b-25: rnam pa thams cad du bla ma mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1904:14b-26: gal te yod na rgyal po dang sa bdag dang /
T02D1904:14b-29: bdag nyid kyi'ang zhi rgyas 'phel bar bya ba'i don de bzhin sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1904:14b-30: tha mar dgang blugs phul nas zhal bsil la sogs pa drangs te mkhyen par gsol te /
T02D1904:14b-31: bzod pa gsol ba byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1904:14b-32: de nas zangs su legs par bkrus pa sbyin sreg gi lhag ma'i sbrang rtsi dang /
T02D1904:14b-33: 'o ma dang bu ram dang ka ra la sogs
T02D1904:14b-34: pa bsres pa'i thug pa rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i
T02D1904:14b-35: sngags kyis legs par bsgrubs nas //
T02D1904:14b-36: gser la sogs pa'i snod du blugs te /
T02D1904:14b-37: aom d'i be aanne sa m'a dhi dhy'a na pr'i na ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1904:14b-38: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yongs su bzlas te /
T02D1904:14b-39: lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1904:15a-0: de nas dri gtsang khang la sogs pa'i gnas su legs par @15a * //
T02D1904:15a-1: bslabs pa'i bzo bos byas pa sku sum cha'i tshad
T02D1904:15a-2: kyi gdan khri la steng dang 'og tu gzigs pa
T02D1904:15a-3: ma yin par drang par legs par brtan par byas
T02D1904:15a-4: te / aom su pra tishtha badzra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1904:15a-5: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1904:15a-6: ma yin na nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1904:15a-7: snga ma bsang gtor la sogs pa phul te yang
T02D1904:15a-8: dag par mchod nas bstod de bdud rtsi myang ba
T02D1904:15a-9: byas la yi ge brgya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas
T02D1904:15a-10: te mkhyen par gsol te bzod gsol bya'o //
T02D1904:15a-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras lha //
T02D1904:15a-12: gang zhig tshangs sogs lha yi ni //
T02D1904:15a-13: tshogs rnams lha yi bya ba la //
T02D1904:15a-14: ma tshang ba ni bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D1904:15a-15: kun du zhi dang bde legs dang //
T02D1904:15a-16: yon bdag don ched mdzad nas ni //
T02D1904:15a-17: slar yang 'byon par mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02D1904:15a-18: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D1904:15a-19: bskal pa brgya ni brgya yi bar //
T02D1904:15a-20: gang gi sku gzugs 'di bzhugs pa //
T02D1904:15a-21: sa chu me dang rlung gi lha //
T02D1904:15a-22: thams cad kyis ni srung bar mdzod //
T02D1904:15a-23: rang gnas bde bar gshegs nas ni //
T02D1904:15a-24: shin tu dga' gcugs yid kyis ni //
T02D1904:15a-25: slob dpon slob mar yang dag ldan //
T02D1904:15a-26: bu dang bu mor bcas pa srungs //
T02D1904:15a-27: khyad par brjod par bya ste /
T02D1904:15a-28: bris pa dang brtsigs pa rnams la yang ji skad bshad pa'i tshogs rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D1904:15a-29: de la ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ram /
T02D1904:15a-30: rab tu gnas par bya ba'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1904:15a-31: rje btsun gyi mchod rten la ni dri gtsang khang bskyed pa'i cho gas bskyed nas /
T02D1904:15a-32: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pho brang du bsgoms nas /
T02D1904:15a-34: byang chub sems dpa' dang rig pa dang gsang sngags
T02D1904:15a-35: kyi lha ma lus pa bkug nas mchod rten gyi
T02D1904:15a-36: nang du rab tu gzhug cing /
T02D1904:15a-37: bcings te dbang du byas nas bsang gtor dang /
T02D1904:15a-38: aargha dang zhabs bsil dang dbang bskur dang mchod pa
T02D1904:15a-39: dang bstod pa byas nas bdud rtsi myang ba byas
T02D1904:15a-40: te / aom su pra tishtha badzra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1904:15a-41: aom h'um hri bhrum tre tastha zhes pa'i sngags kyis rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D1904:15a-42: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1904:15a-43: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam shes rab kyi pha
T02D1904:15b-0: rol tu phyin pa la @15b sogs pa ni 'di
T02D1904:15b-1: ltar rab tu gnas par bya ste /
T02D1904:15b-2: yi ge dhi yongs su gyur pa las shes rab
T02D1904:15b-3: kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser gyi mdog can
T02D1904:15b-4: / rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rang snang gi thabs
T02D1904:15b-5: la 'khyud pa phyag bar ma gnyis kyis chos kyi
T02D1904:15b-7: phyag tha ma gnyis ni mchog sbyin dang po ti bsnams par bsgoms nas /
T02D1904:15b-8: de yongs su gyur pa'i yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyis dkrigs par glegs bam rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D1904:15b-9: aom pradzny'a shru ti smri ti ma ti bi dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1904:15b-10: dham zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D1904:15b-11: gsang sngags kyi glegs bam la ni 'od dpag med
T02D1904:15b-12: yi ge'i gzugs su gyur par blta ste rab tu
T02D1904:15b-13: gnas par bya'o // yang na gsang sngags kyi po
T02D1904:15b-14: ti bzhin du dam chos kyi glegs bam rab tu
T02D1904:15b-16: 'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor dang sngar bstan pa'i sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1904:15b-17: rdo rje 'chang rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par rnam par bsgoms te 'di thams cad du'o //
T02D1904:15b-18: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1904:15b-19: gtsug lag khang yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D1904:15b-20: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi pho brang
T02D1904:15b-21: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings rgya che
T02D1904:15b-22: bar yid kyis bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1904:15b-23: de nas aom h'um hri'i zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis
T02D1904:15b-24: rab tu gnas pa la sogs pa byas te gtor
T02D1904:15b-25: ma mchod pa'i nye bar spyod pa la sogs pa
T02D1904:15b-26: phul nas // aom su pra tiththa badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D1904:15b-27: aom h'um hr'i:bhr'um kham bidzr'a bha ba dri dho tishtha
T02D1904:15b-28: bhr'um kham zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rab tu gnas
T02D1904:15b-29: nas // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D1904:15b-30: rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa rnams kyis byin gyis
T02D1904:15b-31: brlabs pa rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa shin tu
T02D1904:15b-32: brtan par bsgoms nas bum pa thams cad kyi chus
T02D1904:15b-33: gtsug lag khang thams cad du bsang gtor byas te
T02D1904:15b-34: nas // / aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so //
T02D1904:15b-35: de nas gtsug lag khang gi srung ma nag po
T02D1904:15b-36: chen po sgrub pa'i thabs nas bshad pa lta bu'i
T02D1904:15b-37: mtshan nyid can yid kyis bkug ste /
T02D1904:15b-38: ro gcig tu gzhug cing bcings te dbang du byas
T02D1904:15b-39: nas slob dpon rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor
T02D1904:16a-0: dang ldan pas bka' bsgo bar bya ste @16a *
T02D1904:16a-1: // gtsug lag khang 'di ji srid gnas par khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D1904:16a-2: sdig pa med pa'i las rnams bya zhing slob dpon
T02D1904:16a-3: dang dge 'dun gyi bya ba thams cad la mchog
T02D1904:16a-5: de ltar byas nas bla mas slob ma bos te /
T02D1904:16a-6: gus pa dang bcas pas yang dag par smra bar bya ste /
T02D1904:16a-7: gang khyod kyis gsol ba btab pa'i rab gnas sdig pa 'joms pa de kho bos byas kyi /
T02D1904:16a-8: ji ltar bde bar nan tan gyis mchod pa bya'o //
T02D1904:16a-9: de nas sngags kyis sbyangs pa'i ts'a ru de la
T02D1904:16a-10: byin nas 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhag ma
T02D1904:16a-11: sdig pa 'joms pa ste zo cig ces so //
T02D1904:16a-12: gzhan dag la yang ji ltar thob par nyung du nyung du sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1904:16a-13: de nas yang yon blang ste /
T02D1904:16a-14: slob mas kyang yon dbul bas bla ma mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1904:16a-15: mchod pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis lha rnams mchod de bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyag bya'o //
T02D1904:16a-16: de nas rang gi gnas su song ste dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /
T02D1904:16a-17: dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D1904:16a-18: rnams la ston mo drangs nas yon phul te bzod
T02D1904:16a-19: pa gsol nas slar gshegs par bya'o //
T02D1904:16a-20: de nas bzo bo rnams la ston mo byin te
T02D1904:16a-21: gos dang rgyan la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su
T02D1904:16a-22: mgu bar byas nas slob dpon gyi rjes su 'brangs
T02D1904:16a-23: pa rnams dang / gzhan gyi yang 'khor rnams gos
T02D1904:16a-24: la sogs pa sbyin pas yongs su mgu bar bya'o
T02D1904:16a-25: pa rnams dang / // gzhan yang na nad pa
T02D1904:16a-26: dang mgon med pa rnams kyang nus pa ji lta
T02D1904:16a-27: ba bzhin du mgu bar bya'o //
T02D1904:16a-28: mtshan mo nye du dang 'khor rnams la dga' ston chen po sbyin bar bya ste /
T02D1904:16a-29: pi wang dang gling bu dang /
T02D1904:16a-30: rnga zlum dang rnga zlum dal ba la sogs pa'i sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa'i glu dang /
T02D1904:16a-31: glu dang rjes su mthun pa'i gar gyis skye bo
T02D1904:16a-32: mngon par dga' ba'i bkra shis dang bstod pa rnams
T02D1904:16a-33: kyis bza' ba dang ston mo dang ba ldag pa
T02D1904:16a-36: gos kyi gtam gyis kyang ste nus pa bzhin bya'o //
T02D1904:16a-37: de nas slob dpon dga' ston bsdu ba dang /
T02D1904:16a-38: dkyil 'khor gyis sar bzhugs te yang dag par mchod nas bstod de /
T02D1904:16b-0: yi ge gsum dang mu:'i mtha' can gyis bsdus nas rdul tshon snod gsar par blugs @16b te ;
T02D1904:16b-1: don du gnyer ba la nyung du byin nas chu bor dor bar bya'o //
T02D1904:16b-3: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a
T02D1904:16b-4: dya nutpanna tv'ad mu:zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ba'i lci
T02D1904:16b-6: de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1904:16b-8: skye ba 'di dang gzhan du yang //
T02D1904:16b-9: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob //
T02D1904:16b-10: de bas rtag tu 'di nyid bya //
T02D1904:16b-11: sa dong 'gengs dang rab gnas dang //
T02D1904:16b-12: sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i yo byad gang //
T02D1904:16b-13: de kun slob dpon nyid dbang zhes //
T02D1904:16b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs //
T02D1904:16b-15: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mchog /'dus pa'i tshul du byas pa las //
T02D1904:16b-16: bsod nams bdag skyes gang cung zad //
T02D1904:16b-17: des ni 'gro kun rdor 'dzin shog / rab tu
T02D1904:16b-18: gnas pa'i cho ga ye shes snang ba zhes bya
T02D1904:16b-19: ba slob dpon snang byed zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1904:16b-21: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ba rendra pa'i zhal snga nas dang /
